name: Allbridge Bridged SOL (Fuse)
description: Allbridge SOL (Fuse) is the bridged version of Solana (SOL) token on Fuse network bridged through Allbridge classic dapp. Solana is a Layer 1 blockchain that offers users fast speeds and affordable costs. It supports smart contracts and facilitates the creation of decentralized applications (dApps). Projects built on Solana include a variety of DeFi platforms as well as NFT marketplaces, where users can buy Solana-based NFT projects. Its high performance means Solana doesnâ€™t require a traditional scaling Layer 2 solution; instead, Layer 2s on Solana focus on interoperability and connecting Solana to other chains. Solana combines the Proof-of-History (PoH) consensus mechanism alongside the more common Proof-of-Stake. This ensures Solana achieves consensus more quickly while reducing the workload and solving the blockchain trilemma, where developers have to balance decentralization, security, and scalability.
